6.72d: Fixed a bug with  Spell Steal projectile reaching Rubick while dead.
6.83: Reduced  Fade Bolt manacost from 150 on each level to 120/130/140/150. Stolen spells no longer get refreshed when they get restolen after having a different spell inbetween. Reduced  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Spell Steal cooldown from 5 to 2.
6.79: Increased  Telekinesis cooldown from 18 to 22.  Spell Steal can no longer steal the Aghanim's Scepter upgrade of the enemy if they have a scepter and Rubick doesn't. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Rubick: Reduces  Spell Steal cooldown from 20/18/16 to 5 on each level, increases cast range from 1000 to 1400 and makes all stolen spells be considered to have their Aghanim's Scepter upgrade.
6.72b: Fixed  Telekinesis interaction with  Elder Dragon Form. Fixed  Cheese and the lowest level of  Black King Bar being stealable.
6.72c: Fixed being able to get units stuck with  Telekinesis. Reduced  Fade Bolt bounce radius from 600 to 500. Fixed interaction between  Spell Steal and  Whirling Axes.
6.75: Reduced movement speed from 300 to 290. Reduced  Fade Bolt bounce radius from 500 to 440.
6.76: Reduced  Fade Bolt damage from 75/150/225/300 to 70/140/210/280.
6.73: Reduced  Telekinesis manacost from 160 to 120.  Fade Bolt Increased manacost from 90/95/100/105 to 150 on each level. Increased cooldown from 10 on each level to 16/14/12/10.
6.84: Null Field now also affects creeps.
